column1: Uchi////After every one of my "foodie" friends had berated me for not trying Uchi during a whole year of their existence here in the H
column2: I was getting pretty sick and tired of explaining how my wallet's not made of platinum and blood diamonds. A friend lured us over to Uchi after our happy hour at the bar next door. An expected 45 minute wait flew by as we enjoyed cocktails at the busy
column3: crowded bar. Note that they have a cocktail patio outside where you can wait as well.
